summary: New grad (MS CS, UC Santa Cruz, March 2026) focused on backend systems, AI infrastructure, and networking. Built Saturn, a zero-configuration AI service discovery framework across 11 languages with published packages on npm and PyPI. Strong teaching background (161 students, 87.5% satisfaction). Honest about gaps: no production-at-scale experience, no oncall, limited cloud infrastructure.

strong_signals.evidence: 46% of Saturn codebase. Built async pipelines (aiohttp, asyncio), FastAPI servers, PyPI package. Used across all projects.
Published npm package (ai-sdk-provider-saturn, 4 versions). Vercel AI SDK provider implementing LanguageModelV3. Node.js.
Designed mDNS/DNS-SD protocol from scratch. TXT record metadata schemas. Service discovery, health monitoring, failover.
Built 3 OpenAI-compatible proxy servers with REST endpoints and SSE streaming. Unified interface across cloud and local backends.
OpenAI API, Vercel AI SDK, multi-model pipelines, structured outputs, prompt engineering (CoT, RCoT). Multi-provider benchmarking across GPT-4.1, Claude, Gemini.
Taught PostgreSQL for 3 quarters (161 students). Query optimization, indexing, transaction management, psycopg2, Docker lab environments.
PR to Vercel AI SDK (21.7K stars). Integrated Saturn into OpenCode (103K stars). Published packages on npm and PyPI.
87.5% student satisfaction teaching databases. Multiple 'best TA at UCSC' anonymous evaluations. Taught ages 10-16 at Stanford iD Tech.
Cross-compiled MIPS router binary with OpenWrt integration, systemd services, LuCI web interface.
Set up and taught Docker lab environments for 161 database students across 3 quarters.
11 languages in Saturn. Published packages for Python and JS ecosystems. MIPS cross-compilation for routers.
Designed _saturn._tcp.local. service type with structured TXT records, priority routing, ephemeral auth.
asyncio, aiohttp, aiofiles for parallel processing. FastAPI async endpoints. Background thread discovery loops.
Deployed on GL.iNet MIPS routers running OpenWrt. UCI configuration, systemd integration.

moderate_signals.evidence: 5% of Saturn codebase — used but not deep expertise.
9% of Saturn — VLC media player extensions.
Familiar through AI SDK work, not primary skill.
MCTS, A*, Wave Function Collapse — academic evaluation context.
Cosmo internship — analytics tools for mobile app.

known_gaps.explanation: No experience operating services with thousands of concurrent users or managing production incidents.
No PagerDuty, runbooks, or oncall rotation experience.
Basic GitHub Actions only. No complex deployment pipeline design.
No hands-on experience with major cloud providers.
Docker user but no Kubernetes, Helm, or orchestration experience.
Mostly solo or small-team work. No multi-team codebase experience.
No Datadog, Grafana, Prometheus, or production logging experience.
Can build functional UIs but not a frontend specialist.
Uses LLMs via APIs and prompt engineering; hasn't trained or fine-tuned models.

role_fit_notes.backend_engineer: Strong fit. Python + API design + protocol design + async programming is the core skill set. Saturn demonstrates systems thinking. Gap: no production scale experience.
role_fit_notes.ai_infrastructure: Strong fit. Built AI service discovery from scratch. Multi-provider integration, OpenAI-compatible APIs, streaming. Understands the full stack from model to client.
role_fit_notes.systems_engineer: Moderate-to-strong fit. Protocol design, cross-compilation, embedded deployment, networking fundamentals. Gap: hasn't worked with large distributed systems at scale.
role_fit_notes.frontend_engineer: Weak fit. Can do frontend work but it's not the strength or interest. Would be underutilizing strongest skills.
role_fit_notes.devops_sre: Weak fit. Docker experience but no Kubernetes, no cloud infrastructure, no monitoring stack, no oncall.
role_fit_notes.ml_engineer: Weak fit. Uses LLMs extensively but via APIs, not training. Prompt engineering and evaluation are strengths, not model development.
role_fit_notes.fullstack_engineer: Moderate fit. Strong backend, moderate frontend. Could grow into fullstack but backend is where the depth is.
role_fit_notes.teaching_education: Strong fit. Proven track record: 87.5% satisfaction across 161 students, 3 quarters. Teaching ages 10-16 through graduate level. Multiple independent 'best TA' reports.

experience_level.degree: M.S. Computer Science and Engineering, UC Santa Cruz (March 2026)
experience_level.type: New grad with meaningful project depth
